Question: Navitas Semiconductor CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Navitas Semiconductor

Product: GaNFast™ power ICs and GeneSiC™ SiC semiconductors

- GaNFast™ power ICs integrate GaN power, sensing, control, and advanced safety features in a single device
- GeneSiC™ SiC semiconductors are robust, high-voltage, high-efficiency, optimized for reliable operation in harsh-environment, high-power designs
- The technology improves the performance, efficiency, and adoption of mobile fast charging, EVs, solar, energy storage, home appliance/industrial, and AI data center power
- New system platform designs for EV, solar, data center, mobile, and motor drive will be highlighted, featuring new product technology platforms including GaNSafe, GeneSiC Gen-3 Fast, and Gen-4 GaNFast Half-Bridge
- End-user benefits include increased portability, longer range, faster charging, and grid-independence, with a focus on how low-carbon-footprint GaN and SiC technology can save over 6 Gtons/yr CO2 by 2050
Summary_cn:
Navitas Semiconductor（纳微半导体）

产品：GaNFast™ 功率集成电路和GeneSiC™ SiC半导体

- GaNFast™ 功率集成电路将GaN功率、感应、控制和先进的安全功能整合于一台设备中
- GeneSiC™ SiC半导体是坚固、高压、高效的，专为可靠运行在恶劣环境、高功率设计中而优化
- 这项技术改善了移动快速充电、电动汽车、太阳能、能源储存、家庭电器/工业和人工智能数据中心电源的性能、效率和应用
- 将重点介绍新的EV、太阳能、数据中心、移动和电机驱动的系统平台设计，包括GaN安全、GeneSiC Gen-3 Fast和Gen-4 GaNFast Half-Bridge等新产品技术平台
- 最终用户的好处包括增加便携性、更长续航里程、更快充电和独立于电网，重点关注如何利用低碳足迹的GaN和SiC技术在2050年之前节约超过6亿吨二氧化碳。
